about.description: Dedicated dentist Dr. Alex White, DDS from the University of Dental Sciences, offers 10+ years of experience in preventive and restorative dentistry. Located at 123 Main Street, Cityville, he excels in teeth cleaning, fillings, root canals, and dental crowns. Awarded 'Best Dentist 2022' and 'Outstanding Oral Care Award,' Dr. White has a 4.8 rating. Patient reviews highlight his caring and thorough approach. Available on Wed, Nov 22, 2023, starting at 10:00 AM for a fee of $150.
about.experience: 10+ years of experience in general dentistry.
about.specification: Specializes in preventive and restorative dentistry.

reviews.comment: Excellent dentist! Very caring and thorough.
Beautiful results after my dental crown procedure.
Highly recommend for routine cleanings and checkups.

about.description: Experienced dermatologist Dr. Mark Taylor, MD in Dermatology from the University of Medical Sciences, offers 12+ years of expertise in medical and cosmetic dermatology. Located at 789 Pine Lane, Villagetown, he specializes in acne treatment, skin cancer screening, and cosmetic procedures. Awarded 'Best Dermatologist 2020' and 'Skin Care Excellence Award,' Dr. Taylor has a 4.2 rating. Patient reviews highlight his professional service and effective recommendations. Available on Wed, Nov 22, 2023, starting at 9:00 AM for a fee of $180.
about.education: MD, Dermatology, University of Medical Sciences
about.specification: Specializes in medical and cosmetic dermatology.

reviews.comment: My acne cleared up after following Dr. Taylor's recommendations.
Professional and friendly service during my skin cancer screening.
Dr. Taylor is my go-to for all dermatological concerns.

about.description: Compassionate medicine specialist Dr. Jessica Miller, MD in Internal Medicine from City Medical School, provides comprehensive care with 18+ years of experience. Located at 101 Maple Street, Hamletville, she specializes in health checkups, chronic disease management, and medication management. Awarded for 'Exemplary Service in Internal Medicine' and 'Patient Choice Award,' Dr. Miller has a 4.6 rating. Patient reviews praise her thorough and caring approach, effective chronic condition management, and advice on optimal health. Available on Thu, Nov 23, 2023, starting at 9:00 AM for a fee of $250.
about.education: MD, Internal Medicine, City Medical School
about.experience: 18+ years of experience in internal medicine.
about.specification: Specializes in adult primary care and chronic disease management.

reviews.comment: Thorough and caring approach during my health checkup.
Dr. Miller effectively manages my chronic health conditions.
Great advice on managing medications for optimal health.
